io.confluent.ksql.planner.plan

Class FlatMapNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.planner.plan.PlanNode
      • io.confluent.ksql.planner.plan.SingleSourcePlanNode
        • io.confluent.ksql.planner.plan.FlatMapNode

  • public class FlatMapNode
extends SingleSourcePlanNode
    A node in the logical plan which represents a flat map operation - transforming a single row into zero or more rows.

      • resolveSelect

        public Expression resolveSelect(int idx,
                                Expression expression)
        Description copied from class: PlanNode
        Called to resolve the supplied expression into an expression that matches the nodes schema.

        AggregateNode and FlatMapNode replace UDAFs and UDTFs with synthetic column names. Where a select is a UDAF or UDTF this method will return the appropriate synthetic UnqualifiedColumnReferenceExp

        Overrides:
        resolveSelect in class PlanNode
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the select within the projection.
        expression - the expression to resolve.
        Returns:
        the resolved expression.
